general.name: General Knowledge
general.description: General knowledge and creative writing prompts
prompts: Explain the concept of quantum computing in simple terms.
Write a short story about a robot learning to paint.
What are the main differences between REST and GraphQL?
Describe the taste of your favorite food.
How does photosynthesis work?
Write a haiku about artificial intelligence.
Explain the concept of blockchain technology.
What are the key principles of object-oriented programming?
Describe the process of making a cup of coffee.
What is the difference between HTTP and HTTPS?

technical.name: Technical Deep Dive
prompts: Explain the differences between synchronous and asynchronous programming.
How does garbage collection work in JavaScript?
What are the main features of TypeScript?
Explain the concept of microservices architecture.
How does Docker containerization work?
What are the key principles of SOLID design?
Explain the differences between SQL and NoSQL databases.
How does WebSocket communication work?
What are the main benefits of using React?
Explain the concept of CI/CD pipelines.

creative.name: Creative Writing
prompts: Write a fairy tale about a digital world.
Create a story about a time-traveling smartphone.
Write a poem about artificial intelligence.
Describe a day in the life of a sentient robot.
Create a story about a world where dreams are recorded.
Write a haiku about the internet.
Describe a future where humans and AI coexist.
Create a story about a magical programming language.
Write a poem about data and privacy.
Describe a world where emotions are quantified.
